title: Easy vegetarian lasagne
ingredients: ['For the béchamel', '40g butter', '1 1/2 tablespoons flour', '400ml milk', 'salt and ground black pepper', 'For the lasagne', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '190g passata', '375g lasagne sheets', '375g prepared ratatouille', '1 tablespoon herbes de Provence', '80g grated Gruyère cheese']
